CustomField.description: When this field contains a link, it replaces the “Event Datasheet” on the Events Portal and “Datasheet” on the Fire Packet. If blank, the CMS-generated Event Datasheet (with or without pricing) is used for both. Checking separate field “Exclude Datasheet” hides both the Marketing and CMS-generated Datasheets on the Events Portal and Fire Packet.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When this field contains a link, it replaces the “Event Datasheet” on the Events Portal and “Datasheet” on the Fire Packet. If blank, the CMS-generated Event Datasheet (with or without pricing) is used for both. Checking separate field “Exclude Datasheet” hides both the Marketing and CMS-generated Datasheets on the Events Portal and Fire Packet.
CustomField.label: Marketing Datasheet
